data.description: Popup dialog for username and password
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Yet another Tk derived/constructed widget; but simplifies coding
    for Tk apps that need username/password entry.

    Derived from Tk::EntryDialog, added 2nd label and entry box,
    removed optinal labeltext method in favor of default label text with
    an option to modify.
